h2_title: Where To Use The Old Rattle-Drum in Black Myth: Wukong
content: From the Windrest Hamlet Shrine, turn around and go back towards the Windrest Bridge Shrine. As you head through the gate at the bottom of the hill, take a left to find a small square area within the walls where you can use the drum.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Old Rattle-Drum in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Windrest Hamlet Old Rattle-Drum Location'.
The content is as follows:
From the Windrest Hamlet Shrine, turn around and go back towards the Windrest Bridge Shrine. As you head through the gate at the bottom of the hill, take a left to find a small square area within the walls where you can use the drum.
